values.comment: Hide the cursor

values.name: moveBackwardBy
values.comment: Move the cursor forward N columns. In an LTR language this is to the left and in an RTL language it's to the right.

values.name: moveBackwardLines
values.comment: Move the cursor backward N lines.

values.name: moveDownBy
values.comment: Move the cursor down N lines

values.name: moveForwardBy
values.comment: Move the cursor forward N columns. In an LTR language this is to the right and in an RTL language it's to the left.

values.name: moveForwardLines
values.comment: Move the cursor forward N lines.

values.name: moveTo
values.comment: Move the cursor to the specified row and column

values.name: moveToColumn
values.comment: Move the cursor to the specified column

values.name: moveUpBy
values.comment: Move the cursor up N lines

values.name: restorePosition
values.comment: Move the cursor back to the last saved position

values.name: savePosition
values.comment: Save the cursor's position

values.name: show
values.comment: Show the cursor if it was hidden
